name: Professor Frippel's Special Invention Show: COMPLETE REPORT
name_original: Professor Frippel's Special Invention Show: COMPLETE REPORT
description:
Originally published 4 YEARS AGO (2018, the world was different back then.....).... "Professor Frippel's Special Invention Show" has finally received a FULLY EXPANDED version! "Professor Frippel's Special Invention Show: COMPLETE REPORT" is a new version that has like tripple the content!

This game is built with a limited palette as restriction!

Who is Frippel...?

"Frippel, a Professor banned from the Scientific Community, has something to show...his incredible invention will surely change the world!...or so he thinks. But alas, the results will not be so nicely appreciated!

Now...the science team is in a mysterious dimension...harbouring a mysterious shape...

Can they solve the mysteries of this new mysterious land..?  Maybe they are not alone...

Can they make it back home...?"

-----------------------------------

IMPORTANT NOTICE: the game is still in development. If you are STUCK with a game breaking bug, download the latest version and copy the save file into the new game!

The original game was made for the Mini Jam 15 Technology  #minijam15

Music:
GreenWyvern/Vincent Wright ;
music.is.pixels.therapy
